sentences.english: Fixation pins were placed in the 2 3 metacarpal and radial shaft.
sentences.chinese: 外固定针固定在2～3掌骨和桡骨干上。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical results of distal radius comminuted fractures treated with external fixator.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结桡骨远端粉碎性骨折的外固定架治疗疗效。

sentences.english: The articulation of the radius and ulna in the arm is a pivot joint.
sentences.chinese: 手臂桡骨和尺骨的连接关节是一个枢轴关节。

sentences.english: During pronation and supination , the radial head and joint line can easily be identified.
sentences.chinese: 在手臂内旋和外转中，很容易确定桡骨头和关节线。

sentences.english: Can how long of is radius small fracture pull down gesso ?
sentences.chinese: 桡骨小头骨折多长时间可以拆掉石膏？

sentences.english: All of the medial ends of epiphyseal lines located in the articular surfaces of the ulnar notch of radii.
sentences.chinese: 全部骺线的内侧端都是位于桡骨的尺切迹关节面内。

sentences.english: Two patients were treated by resection of capitulum radius and plaster fixation after operation.
sentences.chinese: 均行桡骨小头切除术，术后常规石膏固定对症处理。

sentences.english: Objective To study an effective method of treating comminuted fractures of distal radius.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨一种治疗桡骨远端粉碎性骨折的有效方法。

sentences.english: Just radial to this aiming point is the starting point for proximal screw insertion.
sentences.chinese: 近侧螺钉进入点刚好在桡骨边。

definition: ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
metacarpal bone (long bones in the hand and feet)
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
